TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CommunicationObject extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public MustInherit Class CommunicationObject Implements ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 提供對系統中所有通訊導向物件而言常用的基本狀態機器基底實作，這些物件包括通道、接聽程式，以及通道與接聽程式處理站。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for the basic state machine common to all communication-oriented objects in the system, including channels, listeners, and the channel and listener factories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作所有通訊物件在 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的介面。The class implements the interface for all communication objects in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 方法實作會處理參數驗證、引發會通知發生狀態轉換的事件、提供與這些狀態轉換相關之其他處理的方法，以及確定這類狀態變更會經過協調。The method implementations handle parameter validation, raise events that notify the occurrence of state transitions, provide the means to associated additional processing with these state transitions, and ensure that such state changes are coordinated.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 導致通訊物件立即從目前的狀態轉換為關閉狀態。

span.span: Causes a communication object to transition immediately from its current state into the closing state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法表示應該忽略任何未完成的工作，或在傳回前強制終止。This method indicates that any unfinished work should be ignored or ungracefully terminated before returning. 您可以使用 方法來取消任何未處理的作業，包括未處理的 呼叫。The method can be used to cancel any outstanding operations, including outstanding calls to . 若要將 從任何 以外的狀態順利轉換為 狀態，請呼叫 或是其中一個非同步版本：。To gracefully transition a from any state other than into the state, call or one of its asynchronous versions, .

summary.span: 開始非同步作業以關閉通訊物件。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以在預設時間間隔內，將 從 狀態以外的任何狀態順利轉換至 狀態。This method causes the to gracefully transition from any state, other than the state, into the state within a default interval of time. 方法可讓任何未完成的工作在傳回前完成 The method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning. (例如，完成傳送任何經過緩衝處理的訊息)。For example, finish sending any buffered messages). 如果通訊物件一開始處於 狀態，這個方法就會呼叫 。This method calls if the communication object was initially in the state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讓 從 狀態以外的任何狀態順利轉換至 狀態。This method causes a to gracefully transition from any state, other than the state, into the state. 方法可讓任何未完成的工作在傳回前完成 The method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning. (例如，完成傳送任何經過緩衝處理的訊息)。For example, finish sending any buffered messages. 在呼叫 方法後， 會進入並維持 狀態，直到轉換至 狀態完成為止。The enters the state and remains in it after the method is called until the transition to the state is completed. 轉換包含對於 、 和 進行後續呼叫。The transition consists of making successive calls to , , and . 也有非同步的方式可用於關閉方法，亦即藉由呼叫 啟始。There is also an asynchronous version of the close method that is initiated by calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫 方法時，這個方法會使 進入 狀態並呼叫 、 和 。When called, the method causes a to enter into the state and calls , , and . 方法會將物件的狀態設定為 狀態，藉此完成 方法。The method completes the method by setting the state of the object to the state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Open() cil managed
abstract member Open : unit -> unit override this.Open : unit -> unit

summary.span: 導致通訊物件從已建立狀態轉換為已開啟狀態。

span.span: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當具現化 時，它一開始會處於 狀態。When a is instantiated, it begins in the state. 在 狀態下，可以設定物件 (例如可以設定屬性或註冊事件)，但是仍無法傳送或接收訊息。In the state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages. 呼叫 方法時，這個方法會使 進入 狀態並呼叫 、 和 。When called, the method causes a to enter into the state and calls , , and . 方法會將物件的狀態設定為 狀態，藉此完成 方法。The method completes the method by setting the state of the object to the state. 在In the 狀態下， 可供使用 (例如可以接受訊息)，但是無法再進行設定。 state, the is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable. 也有非同步的方式可用於開啟方法，亦即藉由呼叫 啟始，呼叫 完成。There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling and completed by calling . ### Windows 驗證的憑證擷取Credentials Capture with Windows Authentication 當使用 Windows 驗證時，服務會根據目前的內容執行緒使用認證。When using Windows authentication, credentials used by the service are based on the current context thread. 當呼叫 `Open` 方法時會取得認證。The credentials are obtained when the `Open` method is called. > [!NOTE] > 如果是非同步呼叫，當叫用 時會擷取認證。For asynchronous calls, credentials are captured when the is invoked. 然而，這無法保證是實際的認證。However, the actual credentials cannot be guaranteed. 也就是說，呼叫者的認證可能會切換為其他身分識別。That is, the credentials of the caller may be switched to another identity. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows 用戶端訊息安全性](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/message-security-with-a-windows-client.md)。For more information, see [Message Security with a Windows Client](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/message-security-with-a-windows-client.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當具現化 時，它一開始會處於 狀態。When a is instantiated, it begins in the state. 在 狀態下，可以設定物件 (例如可以設定屬性或註冊事件)，但是仍無法傳送或接收訊息。In the state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages. 呼叫 方法時，這個方法會使 進入 狀態並呼叫 、 和 。When called, the method causes a to enter into the state and calls , , and . 方法會將物件的狀態設定為 狀態，藉此完成 方法。The method completes the method by setting the state of the object to the state. 在In the 狀態下， 可供使用 (例如可以接受訊息)，但是無法再進行設定。 state, the is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable. 也有非同步的方式可用於開啟方法，亦即藉由呼叫 啟始，呼叫 完成。There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling and completed by calling .
